SEARCH

Class Faculty

java.lang.Object
User
Faculty
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollegeInterface
public class Faculty extends User
Represents a faculty member in a college context. This class extends the User class, adding specific properties related to faculty members like school code, school description, office location, and phone extension. It provides methods to get and set the faculty member's professional details.
Since:
1.0 (January 14, 2024)

  • Constructor Details

    • Faculty

      public Faculty() throws InvalidIdException, InvalidNameException, InvalidPasswordException
      Default constructor. Initializes a new faculty member with default values for school code, school description, office location, and phone extension.
      Throws:
      InvalidIdException
      InvalidNameException
      InvalidPasswordException

    • Faculty

      public Faculty(long id, String password, String firstName, String lastName, String emailAddress, Date enrolDate, Date lastAccess, boolean enabled, char type, String schoolCode, String schoolDescription, String office, int extension) throws InvalidIdException, InvalidNameException, InvalidPasswordException
      Parameterized constructor. Initializes a new faculty member with the specified school code, school description, office location, and phone extension.
      Parameters:
      id - The user ID of the faculty member.
      password - The password of the faculty member.
      firstName - The first name of the faculty member.
      lastName - The last name of the faculty member.
      emailAddress - The email address of the faculty member.
      enrolDate - The enrolment date of the faculty member.
      lastAccess - The last access date of the faculty member.
      enabled - The status indicating if the faculty member is enabled or disabled.
      type - The type of the user (faculty member).
      schoolCode - The school code associated with the faculty member.
      schoolDescription - The description of the school where the faculty member works.
      office - The office location of the faculty member.
      extension - The phone extension number for the faculty member.
      Throws:
      InvalidIdException
      InvalidNameException
      InvalidPasswordException
